page.title: 15Mr.P.Marsh-afternoon Lydden
page.content: The meeting confirmed that we would give prizes and medals to apprentice Masons and stage a triennial award for the best building in natural stone within 7 miles radius of the Guildhall. Caught the 1255 train from Charing Cross,without lunch! Back in the office 1435 until 1815,when I left for home.During that time I dealt with costs and obtaining of grant for restoration of Ulcombe Church near Maidstone,the approval of a new brochure for Canterbury Cathedral Appeal(I am the Surveyor to the Fabric, which is the statutory title for the Architect)and various office management problems.My practice comprises 28 people inculding seven partners.At home I went for a walk with Valerie,Henry, the pony and the dogs over the adjoining farm. 2020 Evening meal.2100 Writing reports.2308 Went to bed.
